CheckTitle: Checks if IAM users, groups, and roles have no inline policies. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any IAM entity has inline policies.
Description: Checks if IAM users, groups, and roles have no inline policies. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if any IAM entity has inline policies.
Risk: Inline policies can make permission management complex and error-prone. It is recommended to use managed policies attached to groups or roles to simplify permission management and ensure the principle of least privilege.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that IAM users, groups, and roles do not have inline policies
